EmailTemplate.name: College Factual Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Finding the Best Fit College for You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!NGIB_Query__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Get help finding your best-fit college, careers and majors based on your individual strengths, interests and experiences in the military.
IAVA Members Get Started FREE, http://pages.collegefactual.com/iava/?cfRefID=newgibill&utm_source=newgibill&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cf-optin-email&utm_content=A&myPriorObligation={!NGIB_Query__c.myPriorObligation__c}&myCumulativePost911Service={!NGIB_Query__c.myCumulativePost911Service__c}&myMilitaryStatus={!NGIB_Query__c.myMilitaryStatus__c}&myDischargeDate={!NGIB_Query__c.myDischargeDate__c}&myMontgomoryContribution={!NGIB_Query__c.myMontgomoryContribution__c}&myPost911BenefitUsed={!NGIB_Query__c.myPost911BenefitUsed__c}&myPost911BenefitRecipient={!NGIB_Query__c.myPost911BenefitRecipient__c}&myState={!NGIB_Query__c.myState__c}&myOnlineStatus={!NGIB_Query__c.myOnlineStatus__c}&myAttendancePct={!NGIB_Query__c.myAttendancePct__c}&collegeId1={!NGIB_Query__c.collegeId1__c}&collegeId2={!NGIB_Query__c.collegeId2__c}&collegeId3={!NGIB_Query__c.collegeId3__c}
Find your future in less than 10 minutes with College Factual.
Sincerely, Josh McWilliam College Factual Co-Founder
